product_summary: Ecango is an AI-powered transcription and translation tool that enables users to convert audio and video files into text in over 90 languages with 99.8% accuracy. The tool is easy to use, affordable, and offers a variety of features, including speaker identification, diarization, and seamless editing. Ecango is a valuable tool for anyone who needs to transcribe or translate audio or video content.
product_cons: Can be slow to transcribe long files
May not be able to handle complex audio

product_usecases.details: Ecango can be used to transcribe interviews for research, journalism, or legal purposes. The tool's high accuracy rate ensures that transcripts are accurate and reliable.
Ecango can be used to translate foreign language videos into over 90 languages. This makes it a valuable tool for businesses and individuals who need to communicate with people from other cultures.
Ecango can be used to create subtitles for videos. This makes it easier for people who are deaf or hard of hearing to access video content.
Ecango can be used to transcribe podcasts. This makes it easier for people to read and search podcast content.
Ecango can be used to transcribe meetings. This makes it easier for people to take notes and follow up on what was discussed.

product_toolfor.details: Ecango can be used by students to transcribe lectures, interviews, and other audio content. The tool's affordable pricing and ease of use make it a great option for students on a budget.
Ecango can be used by journalists to transcribe interviews, press conferences, and other audio content. The tool's high accuracy rate ensures that transcripts are accurate and reliable.

Ecango can be used by researchers to transcribe interviews, focus groups, and other audio content. The tool's ability to identify speakers and diarize transcripts makes it a valuable tool for qualitative research.

Ecango can be used by businesses to transcribe meetings, webinars, and other audio content. The tool's ability to translate transcripts into over 90 languages makes it a valuable tool for businesses that operate in multiple countries.

Ecango can be used by individuals to transcribe personal audio recordings, such as family history interviews or travelogues. The tool's ease of use and affordable pricing make it a great option for individuals who need to transcribe audio content.

product_pricing: Ecango offers three pricing plans: Free, Pro, and Business.
